text: Va kasone, ki diruz orzu mekardand, ʙa coji u ʙosand, ʙomdod [-i ruzi ʙa'd] meguftand: «Voj ʙar mo! Gui Alloh taolo ast, ki [ne'matu] ruziro ʙar har ki ʙixohad gusturda medorad va [jo] tang megirad. Agar Alloh taolo ʙar mo minnat nanihoda ʙud, hatman, moro [niz ʙa sazoi suxanonamon ʙa ƶarfoi zamin] furu meʙurd. Ej voj! Gui kofiron hargiz rastagor namesavand
